root.name: Psycho Pinball
root.description: OverviewPsycho Pinball is a pinball game developed and published by Codemasters for the Genesis and PC platforms.GameplayThe game features for 4 tables, Wild West, The Abyss, Halloween, and Amusement Park.Wild WestThe map features a mini-game that is a simple form of black jack, where you have a one-shot chance at guessing if you have a better hand than the "dealer" and win loads of points.The AbyssHalloweenAmusement ParkThe Amusement park is special in that it has the ability to transfer the player into the any of the other 3 tables with all the special bonuses they include, for 1 round. Failing in any of these transfered tables will not cause you to lose a ball, but will return you to the Amusement table, where, if you are able can transfer to any of the other 3 tables.It is also the hardest with the least bonuses outside the transfer ability.The game has a score limit, easily obtained via the Amusement park of 999.999.999 points simply because the games counter stops counting at 9 digits.
